description:
Sunny, modern 1000+ sq. ft. apartment in Crown Heights, Brooklyn.
2 large bedrooms separated by a spacious living and dining room. 2 new bathrooms (one ensuite) affording absolute privacy when needed. 

All new furnishings, luxury linens and toiletries. Well equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances.

Parking available for $20 per day.

Managed by: Nirvana Brooklyn

Sun drenched interior, bamboo flooring,  spacious living room, functionally designed with luxury finishes.

100% - the space is all yours!

We're always available via text or old fashion phone call.

Along the 5 minute walk from the Subway at the corner of Ralph Avenue and Fulton Street there's a Pharmacy, Church, Supermarket, Wine Shop, Florist, Laundromart, Gas Station, McDonald's and numerous other conveniences.

We are 10 minutes from BARCLAY's CENTER and approximately 35 minutes from TIMES SQUARE on the weekends, during the week and at rush hour service is considerably faster using the Ralph Avenue A/C Subway, which is only a from 3 block walk from the house.

Absolutely no smoking is allowed in the residence or hallways. 

No illegal substances or activity permitted or tolerated.
name: Modern 2BR - 2 Bath Private Residence
review:
O espaço é exatamente como é anunciado, as fotos são reais e é tudo muito confortável.
Fica muito próximo ã estação Raph da linha C do metro, tem farmácias e mercadinhos por perto.
Tem toda a infraestrutura para cozinhar e passar bons momentos em família. A atenção da Ally é fenomenal, ela sempre está disposta a ajudar e responde rapidamente qualquer contato feito. 
Recomendado.
